alt: Three smiling people under a wooden frame in a desert with mountains behind

captions.ultra: Three people at a desert event under a wooden frame, smiling.
captions.compact: Three people stand shoulder to shoulder beneath a simple wooden frame in a bright desert setting. Left wears a wide-brim hat and sunglasses with a chest strap; center wears round glasses and a bright scarf; right wears a light tee with sunglasses hanging from a neck cord. Mountains in the far distance under a partly cloudy sky; overall mood is friendly and casual.

qa.a: Desert with wooden frame and distant mountains
